subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Buffalo Sabres forward Derek Roy avoided N.H.L. arbitration yesterday by agreeing to a six-year, $24 million contract. Roy, a third-line center, had 63 points in 75 games. Roy made $627,000 last season.
snippet: Buffalo Sabres forward Derek Roy avoided N.H.L. arbitration yesterday by agreeing to a six-year, $24 million contract. Roy, a third-line center, had 63 points in 75 games. Roy made $627,000 last season.
